players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie was a good person, and I'm sad he's gone. We need to figure out who killed him."
Bob: "I am the mafioso. I killed Charlie last night to protect my identity."
Diana: "I believe Bob is telling the truth, but I'm not convinced he's the only mafioso. We should investigate Alice and see if she has any alibis for last night."
